column5: Still looking for any info on Kabinakagami Lake - Pine Portage Lodge. Doing a fly-in there in 08. Just looking for general fishing info. Any help is appreciated. Thanks

The lodge is great, the staff are great, good equipment and good fishing. Plenty of walleye between 15 and 22, with few over. Tons of pike but not a lot of real big ones. One of our group did get a 40" this year.
